text: Jiss haal per tum ho ussi per Allah eman walon ko na chor dey ga jab tak kay pak aur na pak ko alag alag na ker dey aur na Allah Taalaa aisa hai kay tumhen ghaib say aagah ker dey bulkay Allah Taalaa apney rasoolon mein say jiss ka chahaye intikhab ker leta hai iss liye tum Allah Taalaa per aur uss kay rasoolon per eman rakho agar tum eman lao aur taqwa kero to tumharay liye bhari ajar hai
